item.title: VMware ovftool installation was unsuccessful on Ubuntu 20.04 - A workaround
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Guske
item.description: I couldn't install the VMware ovftool on my Ubuntu 20.04 LTS client and because of this, I'm going to explain how you can run it without having it installed.

item.title: VMware vctl KinD - Writing configuration failed
item.author: robert.guske@gmail.com
item.dc:creator: Robert Guske
item.description: VMware Fusion can instantiate KinD clusters locally on your desktop (project Nautilus) but recently I discovered some restrictions which I'm explaining in this post.
